Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2016, going 3-1, 1.19...
Won Cy Young in 2016, going 18-9, 2.89 ERA...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,264,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...

2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,264,286 through salary arbitration...

Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
10/2/2019: Signed a contract extension with Baltimore, $20,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Injured on 3/11/2020 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/18/2020 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won World Series with Baltimore in 2020...
Injured on 3/5/2021 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2021, going 7-0, 1.49...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young in 2021, going 24-10, 3.21 ERA...
Injured on 5/9/2022 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/7/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $26,270,000 per year...
Hit first career homerun on 8/3/2024, off Benjamin Duty (ARI)...
8/1/2026: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $26,270,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2026, going 4-1, 1.97...
Traded from Atlanta to Los Angeles (A) on 7/30/2027 (Going to LAA: P Dylan Bundy. Going to ATL: P Reinaldo Caballero)...
